member.name: F:Foundations.Foundation.info
member.summary: Module information shown in editors

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.EventAttach
member.summary: Called when the user requests attachment via the GUI.

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.EventDetach
member.summary: Called when the user requests detachment via the GUI.

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.ToggleAttachment(KSPActionParam)
member.summary: Called when the user toggle attachment via the GUI.

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.SwitchEventState
member.summary: Switches the state of the event.

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.OnUpdate
member.summary: OnUpdate:Clean up the PAW if the part doesn't touch the ground

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.Attach
member.summary: Updates the game state to record that we are now attached.

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.Detach
member.summary: Updates the game state to record that we are now detached.

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.OnPartUnpack
member.summary: Called when the part is ready to play with the rest of the physics world.

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.OnJointBreak(System.Single)
member.summary: Called if you our joint breaks - i.e. we get torn out of the ground.

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.CreateAttachment
member.summary: Creates the physical joint constraining our position.

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.DestroyAttachment
member.summary: Removes the physical joint constraining our position.

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.Message(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Messages to the screen in the specified format.

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.Dlog(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add messages to the log. Prepends "Foundations v{0}]: ", Version.Text
member.param: require DEBUG setting to create log entry

member.name: M:Foundations.Foundation.DlogWarning(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add messages to the log. Prepends "Foundations v{0}]: ", Version.Text
member.param: require DEBUG setting to create log entry

member.summary: Formats the information for the part information in the editors.
